import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams} from "react-router-dom"; export default function EditDepartment() { const { id } = useParams(); // const navigate = useHistory(); // Define formData state const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ deptid:"", deptname:"" }); // Define user state // const [user, setUser] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios .get(`https://server-ems-seven.vercel.app//editDept/${id}`) .then((response) => { const userData = response.data; console.log(userData); setFormData({ deptid:userData.deptid, deptname:userData.deptname }); }) .catch((err) => console.error(err)); }, [id]); return ( <>
Edit Department
setFormData({ ...formData, deptname: e.target.value }) } />
setFormData({ ...formData, deptid: e.target.value }) } />
); };
